title: CreateSessionRequest
description: Payload for creating a new session. Used for internal session creation with full control over session properties

id.description: Optional pre-generated session ID. If not provided, server will generate one

projectId.description: ID of the project this session belongs to (required)

taskIds.description: Array of task IDs to be worked on in this session (required)

name.description: Optional human-readable name for this session. If not provided, server may generate one

agentId.description: Optional identifier of the agent running this session

status.description: Optional initial status. Defaults to 'spawning' if not provided

env.description: Optional environment variables for this session

metadata.description: Optional additional metadata (skill info, spawn source, etc.)

_suppressCreatedEvent.description: Internal flag to suppress session:created event emission. For internal use only
